original_title: Traslacion: Ang Paglakad sa Altar ng Alanganin
overview: “Traslacion: Ang Paglakad sa Altar ng Alanganin” focuses on four LGBT couples and their stand on equality and the right to marry. This documentary addresses their complicated quests in defining themselves within a conservative society.
title: Traslacion: Ang Paglakad sa Altar ng Alanganin
